name: !greeting channel #channel
description: Beetle will send all greeting message in #channel

name: !greeting message { content }
description: Set custom content message when someone join your server, use placeholder {pinguser}, {username}, {usertag}, {userid}, {servername}, {usernickname}, {membercount}, {membercount_ordinal}, {createdat}, {joinedat} to replace for specific value content

name: !greeting message reset
description: Reset custom content message to default

name: !greeting embed enable
description: Enable embed greeting message on your server

name: !greeting embed disable
description: Disable embed greeting message on your server

name: !greeting embed title { content }
description: Set custom embed title message content, you can also use placeholder too

name: !greeting embed title reset
description: Reset custom embed message title to default

name: !greeting embed description { content }
description: Set custom embed description message content, you can also use placeholder too

name: !greeting embed description reset
description: Reset embed description content to default

name: !greeting embed thumbnail [ {usericon}, {servericon} ]
description: Set custom embed thumbnail, use {usericon}, {servericon} to display for specific value or use `reset` to reset back to default for none display

name: !greeting embed color #XXXXXX
description: Set custom embed color, use `reset` to reset back to default #FFFFFF

name: !greeting embed footer { content }
description: Set custom embed footer, placeholder support soon...

name: !greeting embed footer reset
description: Reset embed footer to default none display
